title: How much weight can a paper clip hold? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m afraid that’s a vague question. How is the paper clip to be subjected to the load? What size is the clip? I have at least six sizes in my bureau drawer… as a paper clip, holding paper, say, how much load is required to pull a single sheet of paper from the clip’s grasp?as above, but holding multiple sheets of paper as the actual load, which will affect the clip’s ability to grip, dependent upon the thickness of the sheaf of sheets? What paper size and weight is to be used?With the clip forming a link in a chain, then loaded?with the clip loaded in shear or double shear, loaded until failure?With the clip held in cantilever and loaded until failure?Assuming it’s 1. or 2., the best way to find out is by practical experimentation, and then, only after you’ve established what the questioner meant, or how your tutor suggests you interpret the question. Really, when given a brief, the one giving it needs to be precise, and if they’re not, deserves to be bombarded with questions from those who need to know how to interpret the brief before wasting their valuable time doing the wrong thing.
